content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5)
- Boiler (position -4.5, 24.0)
- Steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that there are no blockages in the path when attempting to connect entities such as pipes. Check the positioning of nearby structures before making connections.

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Verify the existence of an entity at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it. If an entity is not found, check if it has been placed or removed previously.
